item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Tagore
item.description: "I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy." -- Tagore

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them, and try to follow where they lead." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "It always seems impossible until it's done." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Serena Anderlini-D'Onofrio
item.description: "A world where it is safe to love is a world where it is safe to live" -- Serena Anderlini-D'Onofrio

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Elizabeth Scott
item.description: "I have been smashed and put back together so many times nothing works right. Nothing is where it should be, heavy thumping in my shoulder where my heart now beats." -- Elizabeth Scott

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by David Thewlis
item.description: "I want that. I want that awful intense and serious unhappiness, cos then I might feel better, and then I might be happy." -- David Thewlis

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Washington Irving
item.description: "There is a sacredness in tears. They are not a mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition and of unspeakable love." -- Washington Irving

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Washington Irving
item.description: "Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart." -- Washington Irving

item.title: Beatriz add a quote by Washington Irving
item.description: "There is in every true woman's heart a spark of heavenly fire, which lies dormant in the broad daylight of prosperity; but which kindles up, and beams and blazes in the dark hour of adversity." -- Washington Irving
